name: ISO/IEC 42001:2023
description: ISO/IEC 42001:2023 AI Management System standard. Provides requirements for establishing and improving an AI management system, including risk assessment and impact analysis.

sections.title: Risk Assessment
sections.description: Systematic identification, analysis, and evaluation of AI-related risks including bias and discrimination.

sections.title: Impact Analysis
sections.description: Assessment of potential adverse impacts of AI systems on individuals, groups, and society.

sections.title: Continuous Improvement
sections.description: Ongoing monitoring, measurement, and improvement of the AI management system and its controls.
